Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at Harlem (Forest Park Branch)
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at Harlem (Forest Park Branch) due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at Harlem (Forest Park Branch) due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
